title: Ghostly robes

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ghostly robes are a member-only a set of magic armour that makes the wearer translucent, which can be obtained by speaking to various ghosts throughout RuneScape after a player has a ring of visibility from Desert Treasure.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ghostly robes
This article is about the clothes. For the miniquest, see Curse of the Empty Lord.
This article is about the robes obtained from the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. For the item used as a ghost costume during Ghosts Ahoy, see Bedsheet.

Ghostly robes are a member-only a set of magic armour that makes the wearer translucent, which can be obtained by speaking to various ghosts throughout RuneScape after a player has a ring of visibility from Desert Treasure.

Speaking to the ghosts will start a miniquest, the Curse of the Empty Lord, in which each ghost will tell you their story, direct you on to the next ghost, and give you a piece of the ghostly robes set. To talk to the ghosts, a player must be wearing a ring of visibility, which is obtained during the Desert Treasure quest, as well as a ghostspeak amulet, which is obtained during The Restless Ghost quest. Many of the ghosts are found in the Wilderness; locations will vary for each player.

The full set of ghostly robes can be stored in a magic wardrobe in the costume room of a player-owned house, saving bank space when not in use. It's also possible to obtain more than one by talking to the mysterious ghost. Once you've spoken to each ghost, you can ask them for more set pieces from all other ghosts the player has spoken to. You can also return to Valdez at Glarial's Tomb to re-acquire them without speaking to the individual ghosts again. You can collect multiple sets from the mysterious ghost for free even if you already have them stored in a bank, in your inventory, or currently equipped.

Obtaining the robes is necessary to get the full amount of kudos from the Varrock museum.

The ghosts[edit | edit source]

  • Valdez - Talk to him to start the miniquest. Gives the ghostly robe (top).
  • Rennard - Gives the ghostly gloves.
  • Kharrim - Gives the ghostly boots.
  • Lennissa - Gives the ghostly robe (bottom).
  • Dhalak - Gives the ghostly hood.
  • Viggora - Gives the ghostly cloak.

Equipment bonuses[edit | edit source]

Totals00021000021000%000.0

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • If you talk to Evil Dave while wearing full ghostly robes and have a hellcat follower, he will say "That outfit is TOTALLY EVIL! And you've got an evil cat too! To be honest I'm a little bit scared of you!"
  • While wearing the ghostly robes and travelling through the desert on magic carpet, you can also see through the carpet at the part your character stands on.
  • Particles are not visible through the ghostly robes.

[[File:Ghostly robes equipped.png|100px|right]]
'''Ghostly robes''' are a member-only a set of magic [[armour]] that makes the wearer translucent, which can be obtained by speaking to various ghosts throughout ''RuneScape'' after a player has a [[ring of visibility]] from [[Desert Treasure]].

Speaking to the ghosts will start a [[miniquest]], the [[Curse of the Empty Lord]], in which each ghost will tell you their story, direct you on to the next ghost, and give you a piece of the ghostly robes set. To talk to the ghosts, a player must be wearing a ring of visibility, which is obtained during the [[Desert Treasure]] quest, as well as a [[ghostspeak amulet]], which is obtained during [[The Restless Ghost]] quest. Many of the ghosts are found in the [[Wilderness]]; locations will vary for each player.

The full set of ghostly robes can be stored in a [[magic wardrobe]] in the [[costume room]] of a [[player-owned house]], saving bank space when not in use. It's also possible to obtain more than one by talking to the [[mysterious ghost]]. Once you've spoken to each ghost, you can ask them for more set pieces from all other ghosts the player has spoken to. You can also return to [[Valdez]] at [[Glarial's Tomb]] to re-acquire them without speaking to the individual ghosts again.  You can collect multiple sets from the mysterious ghost for free even if you already have them stored in a bank, in your inventory, or currently equipped.

Obtaining the robes is necessary to get the full amount of [[kudos]] from the [[Varrock museum]].

==The ghosts==
*[[Valdez]] - Talk to him to start the [[Curse of the Empty Lord|miniquest]]. Gives the [[ghostly robe (top)]].
*[[Rennard]] - Gives the [[ghostly gloves]].
*[[Kharrim]] - Gives the [[ghostly boots]].
*[[Lennissa]] - Gives the [[ghostly robe (bottom)]].
*[[Dhalak]] - Gives the [[ghostly hood]].
*[[Viggora]] - Gives the [[ghostly cloak]].

==Equipment bonuses==
{{Infotable Bonuses|Ghostly hood|Ghostly robe (top)|Ghostly robe (bottom)|Ghostly gloves|Ghostly boots|Ghostly cloak}}

==Trivia==
*If you talk to [[Evil Dave]] while wearing full ghostly robes and have a [[hellcat]] follower, he will say "That outfit is TOTALLY EVIL! And you've got an evil cat too! To be honest I'm a little bit scared of you!"
*While wearing the ghostly robes and travelling through the desert on magic carpet, you can also see through the carpet at the part your character stands on.
*Particles are not visible through the ghostly robes.
